items.name: Platinium
items.description: Pack of 1000 gold, use to trade with most merchant NPCs.

items.name: Ectoplasm
items.description: Rare material from Underwold, common player currency, used to craft fissure armor.

items.name: Zaishen Key
items.description: Only PvP key, rare player currency, used to open the Zaishen Chest on the Isle of the Nameless.

items.name: Armbrace
items.description: High end player currency, collectible item that can be traded for Tormented weapons

items.name: Black Dye
items.description: Rarest dye, rare player currency, can be use to taint armor and weapons

items.name: Silver Zaishen Coin
items.description: Zaishen quest reward, rare player currency, can be traded for basic tool and tomes.

items.name: Gold Zaishen Coin
items.description: Zaishen quest reward, rare player currency, can be traded for bag expansions and rare weapons.

items.name: Deldrimor Talisman
items.description: The Deldrimor Talisman is a unique reward trophy that each character may obtain once from King Jalis Ironhammer in Droknar's Forge explorable area after completing Hell's Precipice. Exchange it with one of the Artisans (listed below) located in Droknar's Forge explorable area for a unique item.

items.name: Amulet of the Mists
items.description: The Amulet of the Mists is a unique reward trophy that each character may obtain once from Suun in the Divine Path after completing Imperial Sanctum. Exchange it with one of the Adepts (listed below) located in the Divine Path for a unique item.

items.name: Book of Secrets
items.description: The Book of Secrets is a unique reward trophy that each character may obtain once from the Keeper of Secrets in the Throne of Secrets after completing Abaddon's Gate. Exchange it with one of the Keepers (listed below) located in the Throne of Secrets for a unique item.

items.name: Droknar's Key
items.description: The Droknar's Key is a unique reward trophy that each character may obtain once from Droknar in the Epilogue after completing A Time for Heroes. Exchange it with one of the Chests (listed below) located in the Epilogue for a unique item.

items.name: Imperial Dragon's Tear
items.description: The Imperial Dragon's Tear is the end-game reward trophy obtained from Miku after completing The Final Confrontation, the last quest in Winds of Change. Each character can receive up to three: one from the normal mode version and two from hard mode. They cannot be traded to other players, but Azume will exchange them for a unique Imperial Dragon weapon.

items.name: Stolen Sunspear Armor
items.description: A Stolen Sunspear Armor can be used to change a single hero's armor set to a hero version of Elite Sunspear armor. To change a hero's armor, speak to Bahldasareh in Dajkah Inlet while that hero is in your party.
items.applies_to: Koss, Dunkoro, Melonni, Acolyte Jin, and Acolyte Sousuke.

items.name: Ancient Armor Remnants
items.description: Ancient Armor Remnants can be used to change a single hero's armor set to a hero version of Ancient armor. To change a hero's armor, speak to Johe in Remains of Sahlahja while that hero is in your party.
items.applies_to: Tahlkora, Zhed Shadowhoof, Margrid the Sly, Master of Whispers, and Razah.

items.name: Mysterious Armor Pieces
items.description: Mysterious Armor Pieces can be used to change a single hero's armor set to the hero-only Mysterious armor. To change a hero's armor, speak to Mureh in The Shadow Nexus while that hero is in your party.
items.applies_to: Norgu, Goren, General Morgahn, Zenmai, and Olias.

items.name: Primeval Armor Remnants
items.description: Primeval Armor Remnants can be used to change a single hero's armor set to a hero version of Primeval armor. To change a hero's armor, speak to the Armorsmith of Whispers in the Gate of Anguish while that hero is in your party.

items.name: Deldrimor Armor Remnant
items.description: A Deldrimor Armor Remnant can be used to change a single hero's armor set to a hero version of Deldrimor armor. To change a hero's armor, speak to Gunnar Poundfist in Gunnar's Hold while that hero is in your party.
items.applies_to: All Eye of the North heroes.

items.name: Cloth of the Brotherhood
items.description: A Cloth of the Brotherhood can be used to change a single hero's armor set to the hero-only Brotherhood armor. To change a hero's armor, speak to Master Armorer Kor in Central Transfer Chamber while that hero is in your party.
items.applies_to: All Eye of the North heroes.

items.name: Current Nick Set
items.description: The full set of collector items needed to trade for the 5 Gifts of the traveler of the current week.

items.name: Next Nick Set
items.description: The full set of collector items needed to trade for the 5 Gifts of the traveler of the next week.

items.name: Charr Salvage Kit
items.description: A Charr Salvage Kit is a type of kit that provides the only method for pre-Searing characters to obtain upgrade components. They look and work the same as Expert Salvage Kits; however, they have only five uses and they can only be obtained as drops from one of the four Charr bosses.

items.name: Charr Bag
items.description: A Charr Bag is an equippable item that provides 10 additional inventory spaces. Because they already hold 10 items, they cannot be upgraded by using a Rune of Holding.

items.name: Gift of the Huntsman

items.name: Survivor Insignia
items.description: A Survivor Insignia is an upgrade component that provides extra health.

items.name: Ghost Forge Insignia
items.description: A Ghost Forge Insignia is a ritualist specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 15 extra armor rating while you are affected by a Weapon Spell. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Centurion's Insignia
items.description: A Centurion's Insignia is a paragon specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 10 extra armor rating while you are affected by a shout, echo, or chant. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Tormentor's Insignia
items.description: A Tormentor's Insignia is a necromancer specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 10 extra armor but increases holy damage you receive. The armor bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia. The holy damage vulnerability is global and stacking.

items.name: Sentry's Insignia
items.description: A Sentry's Insignia is an upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 10 extra armor while you are in a stance. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Bloodstained Insignia
items.description: A Bloodstained Insignia is a necromancer specific upgrade component that reduces the casting time of corpse exploitation spells. This bonus is global.

items.name: Artificer's Insignia
items.description: An Artificer's Insignia is a mesmer specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 3 extra armor rating for each signet you have equipped on your skill bar. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Brawler's Insignia
items.description: A Brawler's Insignia is an upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 10 extra armor while you are attacking. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Pyromancer Insignia
items.description: The Pyromancer Insignia is an elementalist specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 10 extra armor rating against elemental damage and 10 extra armor rating against fire damage. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Herald's Insignia
items.description: A Herald's Insignia is an upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 10 extra armor rating while you are holding a bundle. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Prodigy's Insignia
items.description: A Prodigy's Insignia is a mesmer specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of up to 15 extra armor rating while skills are recharging. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Beastmaster's Insignia
items.description: A Beastmaster's Insignia is a ranger specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 10 extra armor while your pet is alive. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Blessed Insignia
items.description: A Blessed Insignia is an upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 10 extra armor rating while you are affected by an enchantment spell. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Anchorite's Insignia
items.description: An Anchorite's Insignia is a monk specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of up to 15 extra armor rating while skills are recharging. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Aeromancer Insignia
items.description: The Aeromancer Insignia is an elementalist specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 10 extra armor rating against elemental damage and 10 extra armor rating against lightning damage. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Bonelace Insignia
items.description: A Bonelace Insignia is a necromancer specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 15 extra armor rating against piercing damage. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Infiltrator's Insignia
items.description: An Infiltrator's Insignia is an assassin specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 10 extra armor rating against physical damage and 10 extra armor rating against piercing damage. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Minion Master's Insignia
items.description: A Minion Master's Insignia is a necromancer specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 5 extra armor rating while controlling 1 or more minions, 10 extra armor rating while controlling 3 or more minions, or 15 extra armor rating while controlling 5 or more minions. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Stalwart Insignia
items.description: A Stalwart Insignia is an upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 10 extra armor against physical damage. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Forsaken Insignia
items.description: A Forsaken Insignia is a dervish specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 10 extra armor rating while you are not under the effect of an enchantment spell. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Pyrebound Insignia
items.description: A Pyrebound Insignia is a ranger specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 15 extra armor rating against fire damage. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Undertaker's Insignia
items.description: An Undertaker's Insignia is a necromancer specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of up to 20 extra armor depending on how much health one has. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Geomancer Insignia
items.description: The Geomancer Insignia is an elementalist specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 10 extra armor rating against elemental damage and 10 extra armor rating against earth damage. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Disciple's Insignia
items.description: A Disciple's Insignia is a monk specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 15 extra armor while you are affected by a condition. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Lieutenant's Insignia
items.description: The Lieutenant's Insignia is a warrior-specific upgrade component that reduces the duration of hexes cast on you, but causes you to deal less damage and suffer a reduction in armor rating. The damage reduction applies to all types of damage you deal, but the armor penalty only applies to the piece to which it is applied.

items.name: Shaman's Insignia
items.description: A Shaman's Insignia is a ritualist specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 5 extra armor rating for each spirit you control (maximum 15 extra armor rating). This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Dreadnought Insignia
items.description: A Dreadnought Insignia is a warrior specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 10 extra armor rating against elemental damage. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Nightstalker's Insignia
items.description: A Nightstalker's Insignia is an assassin specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 15 extra armor rating while you are attacking. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Frostbound Insignia
items.description: A Frostbound Insignia is a ranger specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 15 extra armor rating against cold damage. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Prismatic Insignia
items.description: The Prismatic Insignia is an elementalist specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 5 extra armor for each attribute rank requirement you meet. It is possible to have the required 9 ranks in all four attributes at once, giving a total of 20 extra armor. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Earthbound Insignia
items.description: An Earthbound Insignia is a ranger specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 15 extra armor rating against earth damage. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Scout's Insignia
items.description: A Scout's Insignia is a ranger specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 10 extra armor while using a preparation. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Saboteur's Insignia
items.description: A Saboteur's Insignia is an assassin specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 10 extra armor rating against physical damage and 10 extra armor rating against slashing damage. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Virtuoso's Insignia
items.description: A Virtuoso's Insignia is a mesmer specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 15 extra armor rating while activating skills. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Stonefist Insignia
items.description: A Stonefist Insignia is a Warrior-specific upgrade component that increases the duration of knockdown on foes. This bonus is global.

items.name: Knight's Insignia
items.description: A Knight's Insignia is a Warrior-specific upgrade component that provides reduction of physical damage. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Windwalker Insignia
items.description: A Windwalker Insignia is a dervish specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 5 extra armor rating for each enchantment spell on you (maximum 20 extra armor rating). This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Sentinel's Insignia
items.description: A Sentinel's Insignia is a warrior specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of extra armor rating against elemental damage, it requires the wearer to have an attribute rank of 13 or more in the Strength attribute. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Radiant Insignia
items.description: A Radiant Insignia is an upgrade component that provides extra energy.

items.name: Wanderer's Insignia
items.description: A Wanderer's Insignia is a monk specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 10 extra armor rating against elemental damage. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Mystic's Insignia
items.description: A Mystic's Insignia is a ritualist specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 15 extra armor rating while you are activating skills. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Stormbound Insignia
items.description: A Stormbound Insignia is a ranger specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 15 extra armor rating against lightning damage. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Vanguard's Insignia
items.description: A Vanguard's Insignia is an assassin specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 10 extra armor against physical damage and 10 extra armor against blunt damage. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Blighter's Insignia
items.description: A Blighter's Insignia is a necromancer specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 20 extra armor while you are affected by a hex. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Hydromancer Insignia
items.description: The Hydromancer Insignia is an elementalist specific upgrade component that provides an armor bonus of 10 extra armor rating against elemental damage and 10 extra armor rating against cold damage. This bonus is not global and applies only to the armor piece equipped with the insignia.

items.name: Bolt of Cloth
items.description: Bolts of Cloth are common crafting materials used in the creation of many types of caster armor.  It is typically found as salvage from existing cloth armor or dropped by enemies that wear clothes.

items.name: Scale
items.description: Scale is categorized as a common crafting material, though it is on the rare side of the common materials. Scales should not be confused with Skale, which is a monster species.

items.name: Pile of Glittering Dust
items.description: Piles of Glittering Dust are a common crafting material used to make armor and rare crafting materials.

items.name: Plant Fiber
items.description: Plant Fiber is a common crafting material used in armor and weapon crafting.

items.name: Granite Slab
items.description: Granite Slabs are crafting materials used in the construction of certain weapons and armor.  They are usually found as salvage from crude weapons, or as pieces of stone-fleshed enemies.

items.name: Wood Plank
items.description: Wood Planks are a common crafting material which can be used to craft weapons and armor.

items.name: Feather
items.description: Feathers are a common crafting material used in armor and weapon crafting. They are almost exclusively obtained as drops from griffons, harpies and tengus and from salvaging their trophies.

items.name: Iron Ingot
items.description: Iron Ingots are a common crafting material used in many warrior armor sets and for crafting weapons.

items.name: Chitin Fragment
items.description: Chitin Fragment is a common crafting material used in armor crafting.

items.name: Bone
items.description: Bone is a common crafting material. It is used for crafting armor and weapons.

items.name: Glob of Ectoplasm
items.description: A Glob of Ectoplasm is a rare crafting material. It is used in the crafting of  Obsidian armor and Chaos Gloves.

items.name: Obsidian Shard
items.description: An Obsidian Shard is a rare crafting  material. It is used in the crafting of  Obsidian armor.

items.name: Diamond
items.description: A Diamond is a rare crafting material introduced in Nightfall.  They are one of the required materials needed to craft Destroyer weapons, which are crafted by Balthor Coalforge in the Slavers' Exile dungeon.

items.name: Sapphire
items.description: A Sapphire is a rare crafting material.  They are used in the crafting of Vabbian armor.

items.name: Ruby
items.description: A Ruby is a rare crafting material used in the crafting of Vabbian armor.

items.name: Steel Ingot
items.description: A Steel Ingot is a rare crafting material which can be used to craft some types of armor.

items.name: Roll of Parchment
items.description: A Roll of Parchment is a rare crafting material. It is used in the crafting of armor.

items.name: Elonian Leather Square
items.description: Elonian Leather Squares are a rare crafting material used in the crafting of a number of armor sets.

items.name: Roll of Vellum
items.description: A Roll of Vellum is a rare crafting material.  It is used in the crafting of certain armor sets.

items.name: Fur Square
items.description: Fur Squares are a rare crafting material used in the crafting of a number of armor sets.

items.name: Tanned Hide Square
items.description: Tanned Hide Square is a common crafting material. It is used for crafting armor for most professions.

items.name: Vial of Ink
items.description: Vials of Ink are a rare crafting material used in the crafting of armor, particularly Monk, Necromancer, and Ritualist.

items.name: Deldrimor Steel Ingot
items.description: Deldrimor Steel Ingots are a rare crafting material used in the crafting of some armor sets.

items.name: Jadeite Shard
items.description: A Jadeite Shard is a rare crafting material.  It is used in the crafting of Luxon armors and Jadeite Summoning Stones.

items.name: Bolt of Damask
items.description: A Bolt of Damask is a rare crafting material. It is used in the crafting of armor.

items.name: Monstrous Claw
items.description: A Monstrous Claw is a rare crafting material that can be used in the crafting of certain armor sets.

items.name: Amber Chunk
items.description: An Amber Chunk is a rare crafting material.  It is used in the crafting of Kurzick armor and Amber Summoning Stones.

items.name: Onyx Gemstone
items.description: Onyx Gemstones are one of the rewards for defeating a dungeon in Guild Wars Eye of the North. They are one of the required materials needed to craft Destroyer Weapons, which are crafted by Balthor Coalforge in the Slavers' Exile dungeon.

items.name: Bolt of Silk
items.description: A Bolt of Silk is a rare crafting material used in the crafting of a number of armor sets.

items.name: Spiritwood Plank
items.description: A Spiritwood Plank is a rare crafting material. Nicholas the Traveler was once told that a fire that burns Spiritwood Planks is capable of comforting spirits.

items.name: Lump of Charcoal
items.description: A Lump of Charcoal is a rare crafting material.  It is used in the crafting of other rare crafting materials, including Steel Ingots and Deldrimor Steel Ingots.

items.name: Monstrous Eye
items.description: A Monstrous Eye is a rare crafting material.

items.name: Monstrous Fang
items.description: A Monstrous Fang is a rare crafting material.

items.name: Tempered Glass Vial
items.description: Tempered Glass Vials are a rare crafting material used in the crafting of Canthan elementalist auras, spectacles and Vials of Ink.

items.name: Bolt of Linen
items.description: A Bolt of Linen is a rare crafting material.  It is used in the crafting of a number of armor sets.

items.name: Leather Square
items.description: Leather Squares are a rare crafting material used in the crafting of a number of armor sets.

items.name: Lion's Arch
items.description: Westbound: If running to Lion's Arch, this allows Prophecies characters to quickly and easily travel to other campaigns.

items.name: Ascalon City
items.description: Eastbound: If running to Ascalon City, this allows non-Prophecies characters to get into Ascalon for cartography and mission purposes.

items.name: Sanctum Cay
items.description: Completing the Sanctum Cay mission allows access to the Crystal Desert in order for Prophecies characters to quickly ascend; although, it might be faster for Prophecies characters to ascend (i.e. become Weh no Su) in Factions if the account also has Factions.

items.name: Temple of the Ages
items.description: Allows access to The Fissure of Woe and The Underworld without using a corresponding passage scroll; however, characters must meet the prerequisites to enter those explorable areas.

items.name: Henge of Denravi
items.description: Allows access to Ventari's Refuge and Druid's Overlook.

items.name: Crystal Desert tour
items.description: The "Desert Tour" gives characters access to the four mission outposts in the Crystal Desert. This allows characters to quickly ascend, therefore gaining access to The Dragon's Lair and the Tomb of the Primeval Kings.

items.name: Droknar's Forge
items.description: The Droknar's Forge run provides early access to maximum-rating armor crafters in Prophecies. Only characters with a core primary profession can benefit from the armor that is crafted in this area.

items.name: Marhan's Grotto
items.description: Droknar's Forge â†’ Marhan's Grotto - Provides access to prestige armor.

items.name: Granite Citadel
items.description: Droknar's Forge â†’ Granite Citadel - Provides access to prestige armor.

items.name: Kaineng City tour
items.description: The Marketplace or Kaineng Center â†’ Senji's Corner â†’ Maatu Keep â†’ Boreas Seabed. Allows characters to continue the campaign from the Boreas Seabed mission.

items.name: Jade Sea tour
items.description: Zos Shivros Channel â†’ Cavalon and most other outposts in the Jade Sea region. Provides quick access to faction farming (i.e. competitive missions or speed clearing Mount Qinkai from Aspenwood Gate (Luxon)). The Sunjiang District mission can be skipped by running to Gyala Hatchery. Access to Harvest Temple requires completing the Unwaking Waters mission.

items.name: Echovald Forest tour
items.description: House zu Heltzer â†’ Most outposts in the Echovald Forest region. Provides quick access to competitive missions for faction farming and to the outposts near where the primary quest The Defenders of the Forest takes place.

items.name: Vabbi tour
items.description: Sunspear Sanctuary â†’ The Kodash Bazaar â†’ Moddok Crevice. The "Vabbi Tour" provides access to the Kodash Bazaar Vabbian armor crafter much earlier than otherwise, and also to skip a mission and continue at Moddok Crevice.

items.name: Eye of the North tour
items.description: Eye of the North or Gunnar's Hold â†’ All other towns and outposts in the campaign. The Eye of the North tour provides access to every outpost in the Eye of the North expansion for quick completion of the campaign quests and access to dungeons.

items.description: Bring you to the Eternal Forgemaster in the Fissure of Woe to craft you obsidian armor.

items.name: Infusion
items.description: Bring you to the Ancient Seer to infuse your armor against the Mursaats.
